content:
Hey everyone!
I need a suggestion.
While updating the tray icon with the new logo, I felt that the Z is no longer comprehensive due to the cut and the small size.
As a solution, I came up with this

Can you please vote which one looks better? It might be subtle or it might be just me :sweat_smile:
cc @Akash Nimare @Abhigyan Khaund
I like the second one. It's more of our logo, we previously had the circle so made sense then.
Yeah, this is the same reasoning behind the non-circled favicon in the webapp (https://chat.zulip.org/static/images/favicon.svg).

What about in Linux and Windows tray?
(Slack uses a white circle background for taskbar and dash, but no circle for tray icon)
I'd vote no circle, but take some screenshots to see?

I also think no circle would seem better. Plus the Slack tray icon with only the pills-thing and transparent background look much modern. Same for ours in mac above. Though maybe we can reduce the size 'a bit' ?
We're the same size (or maybe a bit smaller) as that "A" icon, so I'm not convinced the size is incorrect there?
